1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Runtime structure for calculations written in Koshucode.
4--   'Resource' is bundle of calculation stuff.  
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource
7  ( -- * Modules
8    module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource.Clause,
9    module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource.Concrete,
10    module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource.Include,
11    module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource.Read,
12    module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource.Run,
13    module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource.Resource,
14  
15    -- * Data dependencies
16    -- $DataDependency
17  ) where
18
19import Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource.Clause
20import Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource.Concrete
21import Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource.Include
22import Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource.Read
23import Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource.Run
24import Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource.Resource
25
26
27-- ----------------------
28-- $DataDependency
29--
30-- Dependencies of significant data types.
31--
32-- * 'Resource' uses
33--   'Resource',
34--   'Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relmap.Assert',
35--   'Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relmap.Relmap',
36--   'Koshucode.Baala.Base.Data.Judge.Judge' and
37--   'Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relmap.Construct'.
38--
39-- * 'Clause' uses
40--   'Clause',
41--   'Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relmap.Lexmap', and
42--   'Koshucode.Baala.Base.Syntax.Token.Token'.
43--
44
